headline: DoorDash asks judge to dismiss Uber lawsuit over web ordering services
summary: DoorDash Inc. asked a California judge to dismiss Uber Technologies Inc.'s anticompetition lawsuit against it, arguing that Uber is using an 'ill-fitting' state law to justify its claims.
